creditline: Gift of Dennis Adrian in honor of the artist
description: assemblage with three paper lunch bags painted with bright, grotesque faces across top; wire assemblage hangs from beaded wire over lunch bag faces, and secured at L and R with pipe cleaner; horizontal beaded wire hanging across center; brightly painted background over maps and glass; heavily textured lower quadrant with little peaks
image_copyright: © Rafael Ferrer %2F Licensed by VAGA at Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C NY
medium: Acrylic with pearlescent acrylic, oil pastel, cardboard, copper wire, glass, maps, metal, paper bags, pipe cleaners, and plastic beads on cardboard
title: Salvaje
